# Spec: Improve User Experience

## Goal

Make the app better and more user-friendly.

## Requirements

- [ ] Improve the UI
- [ ] Make things faster
- [ ] Fix bugs

## Constraints

- Don't break anything

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Users are happier
- [ ] App works better

## Out of Scope

- Major rewrites
